name: HEY! LOOK AT THIS BEE!! (Bee Love Letter)
name_original: HEY! LOOK AT THIS BEE!! (Bee Love Letter)
description:
HEY! 💌🐝 LOOK AT THIS BEE!! SHE'S DELIVERING A LOVE LETTER!!!!!

DO YOU ACCEPT???

A short prototype for a silly interactive story that promotes self-care and not taking life too seriously.
You play as yourself, living and chilling in the woods!

IF YOU ARE PLAYING ON A SMARTPHONE: For some sections, the underlined buttons don't always work!
If you can't scroll on that page, turn your phone on its side to landscape mode, back up to portrait mode, and then look for the underlined text (which may be at the edge of your screen). I've only beta-tested on apple devices, so please let me know if you come across this issue on other brands' devices!
